chinese: 研究表明，运动能让我们感觉更好。
english: Research shows the exercising makes us feel better.

chinese: 经济发展需要政府的支持。
english: Economic development needs to be supported by the government.

chinese: 导师应该在课程开始时设定一个明确的目标。
english: Tutors should set a clear goal at the start of the class.

chinese: 教授休了一年的假去写书。
english: The professor took a year off to work on the book.

chinese: 建筑师需要解决问题的能力和对设计的眼光。
english: An architect requires problem-solving skills and an eye for design.

chinese: 气候变化现在已成为值得信赖的科学家们接受的现象。
english: Climate change is now an acceptable phenomenon among reputable scientists.

chinese: 不断上升的温度正在改变野生动物的种群。
english: The rising temperature is changing the wildlife population.

chinese: 讲座是大学里最古老、最正式的教学方法。
english: Lectures are the oldest and the most formal teaching method at university.

chinese: 该部门的研究生比例高于正常水平。
english: The department has a higher-than-normal proportion of postgraduate students.

chinese: 设计师们今天将完成计划。
english: The designers will complete the plan today.
